text: The Serbian Orthodox Church is one of the autocephalous Eastern Orthodox Christian churches. It is the second-oldest Slavic Orthodox Church in the world (after the Bulgarian Orthodox Church). It is made-up of a majority of the population in Serbia, Montenegro, and the Republika Srpska entity of Bosnia and Herzegovina. ==Other websites== *Official website *List of Serbian Orthodox shrines abroad *Svetosavlje.org *Srpsko Blago | Serbian Treasure site â€“ photos, QTVR and movies of Serbian monasteries and Serbian Orthodox art *Article on the Serbian Orthodox Church by Ronald Roberson on the CNEWA website Category:Eastern Orthodox Church Category:Organizations based in Serbia
title: Serbian Orthodox Church
